description.en: The subject gives overview of the health care institution functioning and the nature of the basic nursing care, concepts and nursing process. To monitor patients' condition and carry out basic caring procedures and easier nursing procedures is taught. Overview of the nature of the hospital infection is given and principles of a- and antiseptics are taught.
description.et: Õppeaine annab ülevaate raviasutuse töökorraldusest, õenduse olemusest ning käsitletakse õenduse põhimõisteid ning õendusprotsessi. Õpetatakse jälgima patsiendi seisundit ja sooritama  põetus - ning õendusprotseduure. Antakse ülevaade hospitaalinfektsiooni olemusest ja õpetatakse a- ja antiseptika põhimõtteid.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide knowledge and skills in nursing activities, based on daily living. To achieve the aim supplementary knowledge and skills for developing cooperativeness, empathy, ability to decide and analyse are added.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on saavutada teadmised ja oskused õendustoimingute tegemiseks, lähtudes elamistoimingutest. Eesmärgi saavutamiseks lisanduvad teadmised ja oskused koostööks, empaatia, analüüsi- ja otsustusvõime arenemiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: At the end of the course the student:
- knows how a health care institution is functioning and how to behave in this environment;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb raviasutuse töökorraldust ja käitumisnõudeid (riietus, hügieen jne) ravikeskkonnas,

learning_outcomes.en: - can follow the principles aseptic and antiseptic, knows how to avoid the spread of hospital infection,
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab järgida a- ja antiseptika nõudeid ning vältida hospitaalinfektsiooni levikut,

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the basic nursing concepts and the nature of nursing process,
learning_outcomes.et: - teab õenduse põhimõisteid ja tunneb õendusprotsessi olemust,
- oskab mõõta ja hinnata patsiendi elutähtsaid näitajaid,

learning_outcomes.en: - describe and carry out basic nursing procedures, care for the patient following living procedures,
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kirjeldada ja sooritada õendustoiminguid ning hooldada patsienti lähtudes elamistoimingutest,

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the basics of pharmaceutical conduct.

independent_work.et:
1. Preparation for lectures and practical sessions 
2. Independent reading assignment
3. Final test.
4. Practical session group work - solving situational tasks
 
Instructions for assignments can be found in Moodle course.

description.et:
Individual reading assignment

A reading assignment is evaluated using the following criteria:

1. the responses to questions exhibit depth, showcasing the student's comprehension of the material.
2. appropriate examples are presented.
3. the work has been submitted on time and correctly formatted. 

Non-differentiated assessment - pass/fail

Final Test 

Criteria of assesment

1. Every correct answer in the test gives 1 point. Maximum points are 30.
2. Minimum score for passing is 27 points (90%).

Non-differentiated assessment - pass/fail

Solving situational tasks


1. Is described the problems or potential problems according to the situation
2. Goals for problem solutions have been set
3. Actions to achieve goals are presented based on knowledge and materials was learned in the courses

Non-differentiated assessment - pass/fail

grade_preconditions.et: For passing the course student have to participate in lectures and in practical sessions, pass individual reading assignment and pass positively the final test.

grade_evaluation.et: The final conclusion of the subject includes solving and presenting situational tasks in practical session and result of the test.

debt_elimination.et:
According to Study regulations of Tartu University. On the basis of individual agreements with lecturer. 
All debts have to be corrected 7 day after practical session or test unless otherwise agreed with the lecturer.
